Ice_Bolt.help: You cast a small bolt of crystalline ice at an enemy. This causes smashing and cold damage. Additionally, the chill slows a foe's attack and movement speeds for a time.
Ice_Bolt.targetHelp: Your attack and movement speeds have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Ice_Blast.help: You cast a bolt of crystalline ice at an enemy. This causes smashing and cold damage. Additionally, the chill slows a foe's attack and movement speeds for a time.
Ice_Blast.targetHelp: Your attack and movement speeds have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Frost_Breath.help: You project a cone of frosty breath at your targets. This cone deals cold damage over time and can slow your opponents' movement and attacks.
Frost_Breath.targetHelp: You are suffering cold damage over time and your attack and movement speeds have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
Your movement and attack speed have been reduced by {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Ice_Slick.help: You create a large patch of ice at a targeted area, causing all foes that pass through it to lose their footing. Those caught in the Ice Slick are dramatically slowed, tend to fall down and will be unable to jump.
Ice_Slick.targetHelp: Your running speed has been reduced and you are unable to jump.

Glacial_Wind.help: You unleash a blast of frozen wind outward toward your enemies. This frigid blast chills the targets, dealing cold damage. Additionally, the affected targets suffer from reduced movement and combat speed.
Glacial_Wind.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), High DMG (Cold), Moderate DoT(Cold), -Speed(Foe, All), -Rech(Foe), -Fly(Foe)
Glacial_Wind.targetHelp: Your attack and movement speeds have been reduced and you are unable to fly.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
{PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} reduces your attack and movement speeds and prevents you from flying.

Bitter_Ice_Blast.help: You create a slow, powerful projectile of ice which is launched at your target. The target suffers smashing and cold damage. Additionally, the target's chance to hit, attack speed and movement speed are reduced.
Bitter_Ice_Blast.targetHelp: Your chance to hit, movement speed and attack speed have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
